Text:
If the save game option doesn't work you need to use the standalone flash player.

Just in case you have trouble finding Adobe's standalone flash player:

http://www.adobe.com/support/flashplayer/downloads.html

As far as I can work out, ranks are based on the the number of customers the girl has had combined with the girls refinement.

If you haven't found it yet you can increase a girls rank by selecting "Rank Up" from the "Management" menu.
